com.topright.roboticon

Class PlayerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topright.roboticon.Inventory
      • com.topright.roboticon.PlayerInventory

  • public class PlayerInventory
extends Inventory
    A data structure to store the contents of a player's inventory. Keeps track of: The number of units of ore the player is in possession of The number of units of energy the player is in possession of The number of roboticons with a specific customisation (or no customisation) that the player is in possession of

    Author:
    jcn509

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerInventory

        public PlayerInventory(int oreQuantity,
                       int energyQuantity,
                       java.util.EnumMap<com.topright.roboticon.RoboticonCustomisation,java.lang.Integer> roboticons,
                       int moneyQuantity)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        oreQuantity - The initial quantity of ore stored in the inventory.
        energyQuantity - The initial quantity of energy stored in the inventory.
        roboticons - Maps The customisation type of roboticons onto the initial quantity of each roboticon of that type to be stored in the inventory.
        moneyQuantity - The initial quantity of money that is to be stored in the inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • increaseRoboticonQuantity

        public void increaseRoboticonQuantity(com.topright.roboticon.RoboticonCustomisation customisation,
                                      int roboticonQuantityIncrease)
        Adds roboticons with the specified customisation type to the inventory.

        Ensures that that that number of roboticons to bed added is not negative.

        Parameters:
        customisation - The customisation type of the roboticons to be added to the inventory.
        roboticonQuantityIncrease - The number of roboticons to add to the inventory.

      • decreaseRoboticonQuantity

        public void decreaseRoboticonQuantity(com.topright.roboticon.RoboticonCustomisation customisation,
                                      int roboticonQuantityDecrease)
        Removes roboticons of a specified customisation type from the inventory.

        Ensures that the number of roboticons to be removed is not negative. Ensures that the quantity of roboticons to be removed is not greater than the number stored.

        Parameters:
        customisation - specifies the customisation type that the roboticons to be removed have
        roboticonQuantityDecrease - the number of roboticons to be removed from the inventory

      • getRoboticonQuantity

        public int getRoboticonQuantity(com.topright.roboticon.RoboticonCustomisation customisation)
        Returns the quantity of roboticons stored in the inventory with a given customisation.
        Parameters:
        customisation - The customisation type of the roboticons.
        Returns:
        The quantity of roboticons stored with the specified customisation type.

      • getMoneyQuantity

        public int getMoneyQuantity()
        Returns the quantity of money stored in the inventory.
        Returns:
        The quantity of money stored in the inventory.

      • increaseMoneyQuantity

        public void increaseMoneyQuantity(int moneyQuantityIncrease)
        Increases the quantity of money stored in the inventory.

        Checks to ensure that the amount of money to increase the stored amount by is not negative.

        Parameters:
        moneyQuantityIncrease - The amount of money to add to the inventory.

      • decreaseMoneyQuantity

        public void decreaseMoneyQuantity(int moneyQuantityDecrease)
        Decreases the quantity of money stored in the inventory.

        Checks to ensure that the amount of money to Decrease the stored amount by is not negative. Checks to ensure that taking this much money from the inventory will not cause the amount stored to be negative.

        Parameters:
        moneyQuantityDecrease - The amount of money to take from the inventory.
